mapper.sql: id, deptId, name, navIds, psw, stationId, status, userName
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, deptId, name, navIds, psw, stationId, status, userName) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{navids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_user
deptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
navIds = #{navids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
psw = #{psw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stationId = #{stationid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
